titleStmt.title: The Correspondence of Arthur Schnitzler and Raoul Auernheimer

sourceDesc.bibl: The Correspondence of Arthur Schnitzler and Raoul Auernheimer with Raoul Auernheimer’s Aphorism. Edited with introduction and notes by Donald G. Daviau and Jorun B. Johns. Chapel Hill: The University of North Carolina Press, 1972 (University of North Carolina Studies in the Germanic Languages and Literatures, 73).
